allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Redesign Admin Panel - Remove header, add premium sidebar

- Remove top header completely from admin layout
- Create new premium sidebar with utility dock
- Add collapsible sidebar (280px/84px) with localStorage persistence
- Add sidebar sections: Store, Content, Growth, System
- Add bottom utility dock with theme toggle, notifications, profile
- Add notifications popover with unread count and mark as read
- Add profile dropdown with avatar and menu
- Add mobile drawer support with overlay
- Add tooltips on collapsed state
- Create SidebarContext for collapse state management
- Update AdminLayout to use CSS Grid without header
- Add new admin pages: Customers, Reviews, Settings, Social Videos
- Add reusable components: PageHeader, AdminCard, AdminToolbar
